name: Elections Commission - M. A. M. Rahman of the Kurunegala Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of the Sri Lanka Muslim Congress - M. A. D. Rathnasiri of the Mahara Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of Sri Lanka Freedom Party - P. U. Panawala of the Mahara Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated his office of member of Sri Lanka Freedom Party
